mapper.select: select '' as status ,ash.depart ,ash.category ,ash.code ,ash.desc ,ash.attribute_nm01 ,ash.attribute_nm02 ,ash.attribute_nm03 ,ash.attribute_nm04 ,ash.attribute_nm05 from account_setting_header ash where ash.depart like concat('%', #{depart}, '%') and ash.category like concat('%', #{category}, '%') and ash.code like concat('%', #{code}, '%') and ash.desc like concat('%', #{desc}, '%')

select '' as status ,asd.code ,asd.name ,asd.sort ,asd.attribute01 ,asd.attribute02 ,asd.attribute03 ,asd.attribute04 ,asd.attribute05 from account_setting_detail asd where asd.header_id = #{headerId}
